title: PBE bugging out
body: I don't know if its just me but every time i try to check my PBE status it never works and it doesnt let me see... any help?

replies.body: For now the pbe signup page is down for maintenance. We made a [**post**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/EGhTBUV6-pbe-signups-are-closed), as well as it being on our [**status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe), talking about the future of pbe and how we're working to make things a little smoother down the line!
